content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 23.0), and offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5).
- The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.
- The boiler is out of fuel.
- The offshore pump is working.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position (0, 0).
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace at position (5, 5).

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (z1) and inserter at position (a) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position (z1).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to remove an electric pole
- Ensure that the electric pole you are trying to remove exists at the specified position before attempting to pick it up.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities at the target position.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that there are no placement blockages when trying to connect entities. Check the surrounding area for any entities that may obstruct the connection.

### Errors related to power connections
- Verify that the steam engine is connected to a power network and has the necessary input liquid to function.
